text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Haruki often takes notes, doesn't she?

Oh, it's embarrassing to be seen...!
They're all messy...

Oops, sorry, sorry.
I don't intend to peek...!

...But, yeah.
I do wonder what Haruki is feeling.

Actually, usually, I write a little neater.
It's true, I swear...!

But...
...Does this really matter?

...?
Could you explain what you mean?

...I used to jot down thoughts or ideas
in this notebook.

But lately,
I haven't been able to think of anything to write...

Sometimes, even if I do come up with something,
I get tired and put it off, and end up forgetting what it was...

In the end,
I haven't really written anything substantial...

Is that so... Sorry, maybe I've been
overloading you with lessons and work.

No, it's just that I've been surprised by
the change in environment...!

Now, as an idol, there's so much to learn,
so it's not like you're overloading me...!

...Thanks, Haruki.
But............

Producer-san, please interview me
about today's events...!

If we do a Q&A,
maybe I'll come up with lots of things to write...!

Haha...
Alright, leave it to me...!
